groups

Class GLn_PrimeField

  • java.lang.Object
    • groups.GLn_PrimeField
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Group<GLn_PrimeField>

    public class GLn_PrimeField
extends java.lang.Object
implements Group<GLn_PrimeField>
    A class that models the group of non-singular square matrices over a short integer prime field, implemented in the framework of the Group interface.

    Elements of the group are represented internally by the uniquely defined integer matrix representative mod q whose entries are non-negative and less than q. The reduced matrix entries are computed at the time of construction. This has the subsequent benefit of rapid equality testing between two GLn_PrimeField elements. In particular, the equals method is overridden in this class to test for equivalence of group elements by checking for equality between corresponding matrix entries.

    Remark: The matrix computations mod q in this class are delegated to the class basic_operations.ReducedMatrixOperations of the Arithmetic module.

    Author:
    pdokos

      An override of the equals method which returns true if both: (i) h is an instance of GLn_PrimeField over the same prime and of the same dimension as the element making the call, and (ii) the corresponding entries of the reduced matrix representatives are equal.

      Returns the dimension of the vector space on which the element acts.

      Returns the identity element of the group that contains the element making the call.

      Returns the inverse of the element making the call.

      An override of the hashCode method in accordance with that of the equals method.

      Returns true if the vector space associated with h is over the same field and of the same dimension as that of the element making the call.

      Returns the left action of h on the element making the call.

      Returns the product of this element with the scalar matrix having the value a mod q along the diagonal.

      Returns the transposed element of GLn_PrimeField.

    • Constructor Detail

      • GLn_PrimeField

        public GLn_PrimeField(int[][] sqMtx,
              short q)
        Constructor for a GLn_PrimeField object, invoked by specifying a square two-dimensional array for the matrix entries, and a prime number q for the order of base field.

        It is the responsibility of the client to ensure that the parameter q is prime, and that the given matrix is non-singular mod q.

        Parameters:
        sqMtx - a two-dimensional int array which, as a matrix, is non-singular mod q.
        q - any short prime

      • GLn_PrimeField

        public GLn_PrimeField(short[][] sqMtx,
              short q)
        Constructor for a GLn_PrimeField object, invoked by specifying a square two-dimensional array for the matrix entries, and a prime number q for the order of base field.

        It is the responsibility of the client to ensure that the parameter q is prime, and that the given matrix is non-singular mod q.

        Parameters:
        sqMtx - a two-dimensional short array which, as a matrix, is non-singular mod q.
        q - any short prime

      • GLn_PrimeField

        public GLn_PrimeField(int n,
              short q)
        Constructor for the identity element of GLn_PrimeField for a space of dimension n over the field of q elements.

        It is the responsibility of the client to ensure that the parameter q is prime and that n is positive.

        Parameters:
        n - a positive int value.
        q - a short integer prime.

        public static GLn_PrimeField constructElementaryMtx(int n,
                                    short q,
                                    int h,
                                    int k)
        A static helper for producing elementary matrices, i.e. those which have ones along the diagonal and at the (h,k)-entry, and have zeros everywhere else.
        Parameters:
        n - Any positive int value.
        q - Any short integer prime.
        h - A positive int value, less than or equal to n.
        k - A positive int value, less than or equal to n, and not equal to k.
        Returns:
        The elementary matrix associated with (h,k).

        Returns:

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides the toString method so as to return a String representation of the matrix of the element making the call, in the format of a MATLAB matrix.

        Note that the base field order is lost in this representation.

        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        A String representation of the matrix of the element making the call, in the format of a MATLAB matrix.

      • toUnpunctuatedString

        public java.lang.String toUnpunctuatedString()
        Returns a representation of the element making the call as a String consisting of n^2 + 1 integers separated by single spaces. The first n^2 integers of the list are the entries of the reduced matrix representative, listed by concatenating the rows of the matrix from top to bottom. The last entry is the order of the base field.
        Returns:
        A String representation of the element making the call consisting of n^2 + 1 integers separated by single spaces.
